root.name: SOCOM: U.S. Navy SEALs - Fireteam Bravo
root.description: GameplayGameplayThe most notable aspect of SOCOM: U.S. Navy SEALs - Fireteam Bravo's gameplay is the need to play with the PlayStation Portable's single analog stick rather than the two normally found on a PlayStation controller. Fireteam Bravo utilizes a lock on system where you press the right shoulder button to center on a target. There are numerous varieties of firearms and explosives to be found throughout the game and, although they are different in name due to legal complications, they are accurate in design to their real-life counterparts. MultiplayerOnline LobbySOCOM: U.S. Navy SEALs - Fireteam Bravo comes with online multiplayer supporting up to 16 players, voice-chat, and a variety of modes including Supression, Free For All, Extraction, Demolition, and Captive.
